    • showUpdateColor

      public void showUpdateColor(PlayerColor color, String username)
      Description copied from interface: GameListener
      Method used to show the chosen color. All clients receive the information, the ones that aren't the username, will remove color from their list of available colors.
      Specified by:
      showUpdateColor in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      color - the color chosen by the player.
      username - the username of the player.

    • showUpdateAfterPlace

      public void showUpdateAfterPlace(Map<Position,CornerPosition> positionToCornerCovered, List<Position> newAvailablePositions, Map<Symbol,Integer> newResources, int points, String username, ClientCard placedCard, Side placedSide, Position position)
      Description copied from interface: GameListener
      Method used to show updated information after a place. The two list positions and tiles represent every new available tile added after the last place invocation symbols and total amount represents the new resources added after the last place invocation consider both couples like maps.
      Specified by:
      showUpdateAfterPlace in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      positionToCornerCovered - a map with the covered corners.
      newAvailablePositions - a list with every new available tile added after the last placement.
      newResources - the new resources added after the last placement.
      points - the points present after the placement.
      username - the username of the player.
      placedCard - the card that has been placed.
      placedSide - the side of the card that has been placed.
      position - the position of the card in the playground.

    • showUpdateAfterDraw

      public void showUpdateAfterDraw(ClientCard drawnCard, ClientFace newTopDeck, ClientCard newFaceUpCard, String username, int boardPosition)
      Description copied from interface: GameListener
      Method used to notify the update after a draw.
      Specified by:
      showUpdateAfterDraw in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - the drawn card.
      newTopDeck - the new card that replaces the previous card that was present in the deck.
      newFaceUpCard - the new face up card that replaces the previous one.
      username - the username of the player who performs the drawing.
      boardPosition - from which the card was selected, 4 for golden deck, 5 for resource deck and 0,1,2 or 3 for face up cards.
